service_title: We provide all kinds of services:
welcome_title: Solar power plants from the world's best manufacturers
welcome_title_2: will reduce your energy bills by at least 30%
about_company: Beshyogochnur is a leading company in Uzbekistan specializing in the sale, installation, and maintenance of solar panels and related equipment.
about_company_1: We believe in a future powered by clean energy and strive to make it accessible to everyone. Our solutions help homes, businesses, and government institutions efficiently utilize solar energy, reducing electricity costs and contributing to environmental protection.
about_company_2: With years of experience and a team of qualified specialists, we offer a full range of services: from consultations and design to installation and technical support. Our projects cover both private homes and large-scale commercial facilities, providing them with reliable and efficient solar systems.
about_company_3: We are proud to contribute to Uzbekistan's sustainable future by making solar energy accessible and beneficial for all.
address: Address: Tashkent city, Chilanzar district, Chupanata street, house 6/2
